name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove youtube video radius / rounded border

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the rounded border added to Youtube video as of August 2023

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove the recently added border radius on YouTube videos with this simple and effective Chrome extension. Released in August 2023, YouTube's updated video player design includes rounded borders, which some users might find distracting. This plugin reverts the video player back to its classic sharp edges.

Focused Functionality: Specifically designed to remove the border radius on YouTube videos.

Privacy First: No tracking or data collection. The extension only applies to youtube.com.
Lightweight and Efficient: No unnecessary features, ensuring your browsing experience remains fast and smooth.

Support My Work:
If you find this extension useful, please consider supporting me by buying me a coffee at buymeacoffee.com/brmwch. Your support helps me create more useful tools like this one.

Version 1.0.8 - Update to remove rounded corners from Youtube beta layout. Thanks to 
kilops for getting in touch, your support is really appreciated.

Version 1.0.9 - Updated the recommended video 4x3 grid and autoplay video thumbnails.

Version 1.0.10 - Rounded corners removed from Miniplayer, shorts on homepage, and video placeholders / skeletons.

Version 1.0.11 - Remove rounded corners from miniplayer.
